quote: The future depends entirely on what each of us does every day; a movement is only people moving.

quote: As a small country, both in size and population, our future hinges on the quality of our people.
author: Hassanal Bolkiah

quote: New technology is not good or evil in and of itself. It's all about how people choose to use it.
author: David Wong

quote: Technology is always a two-edged sword. It will bring in many benefits, but also many disasters.
author: Alan Moore

quote: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.
author: Dean Kamen

quote: Technology is an enabler; you have to be at the cutting edge of technology - there is no choice.
author: Uday Kotak

quote: There is great potential to use computer vision technology in a constructive and benevolent way.
author: Fei-Fei Li

quote: As the father of six children, I know very well the challenges technology poses to our families.
author: Mike Fitzpatrick

quote: When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Invisible things are the only realities; invisible things alone are the things that shall remain.
author: William Godwin

quote: You can't please everybody. I give up. I'm not trying to. I don't care. Leave me alone with that.
author: Estelle

quote: I have always had a sense that we are all pretty much alone in life, particularly in adolescence.
author: Robert Cormier

quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: No One Is Alone by Stephen Sondheim is all about thinking for yourself and being your own person.
author: Bernadette Peters

quote: I live alone, with cats, books, pictures, fresh vegetables to cook, the garden, the hens to feed.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: Men was formed for society, and is neither capable of living alone, nor has the courage to do it.
author: William Blackstone

quote: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.
author: Douglas Engelbart

quote: For computer communications, computers talk in little bursts. They're not continuous like speech.
author: Bob Kahn

quote: Computer science is one of the worst things that ever happened to either computers or to science.
author: Neil Gershenfeld

quote: In order to be truly intelligent, computers must understand - that is probably the critical word.
author: Paul Allen

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: We make the future sustainable when we invest in the poor, not when we insist on their suffering.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The future, according to some scientists, will be exactly like the past, only far more expensive.
author: John Sladek

quote: School is practice for the future, and practice makes perfect and nobody's perfect so why bother.
author: Tre Cool

quote: My heroes, my dreams, and my future lay in Yankee Stadium. And they can't take that away from me.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: Our business is about technology, yes. But it's also about operations and customer relationships.
author: Michael Dell

quote: People use technology only to mean digital technology. Technology is actually everything we make.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: I love to use technology to help people have better lives and to reduce our impact on the planet.
author: Megan Smith

quote: If information wants to be free, then that's true everywhere, not just in information technology.
author: Mitch Kapor

quote: In Genesis, it says that it is not good for a man to be alone; but sometimes it is a great relief.
author: John Barrymore

quote: A lot of people prefer to be alone. They would rather be a palm tree on an island. I don't get it.
author: Jose Andres

quote: Idealizing the reality of past romances won't do you any favors as you face Valentine's Day alone.
author: Amy Morin

quote: Some players you pat their butts, some players you kick their butts, some players you leave alone.
author: Pete Rose

quote: The future lies in designing and selling computers that people don't realize are computers at all.
author: Adam Osborne

quote: Machine learning is the science of getting computers to learn without being explicitly programmed.
author: Sebastian Thrun

quote: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Everything is a railway junction where past and future are sliding over one another, not touching.
author: Timothy Morton

quote: In order to design a future of positive change, we must first become expert at changing our minds.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future lies in designing and selling computers that people don't realize are computers at all.
author: Adam Osborne

quote: Science and technology revolutionize our lives, but memory, tradition and myth frame our response.
author: Arthur M. Schlesinger

quote: Technology is only an enabler, which can help achieve the intention of the person who is using it.
author: Jane Chen

quote: If we want to be the banker to every Indian as we want to be, then we will have to use technology.
author: Arundhati Bhattacharya

quote: I'm always interested in what you can do with technology that people haven't thought of doing yet.
author: Brian Eno

quote: The film industry brings people together, and so does technology. I see them as similar platforms.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: I have grown up alone. I've taken care of myself. I worked, earned money and was independent at 18.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Man, I don't want to have nothing to do with computers. I don't want the government in my business.
author: Erykah Badu

quote: In computing, turning the obvious into the useful is a living definition of the word 'frustration'.
author: Alan Perlis

quote: Computers and electronic music are not the opposite of the warm human music. It's exactly the same.
author: Bill Laswell

quote: Computers and the Internet have made it really easy to rant. It's made everyone overly opinionated.
author: Scott Weiland

quote: Computers are hierarchical. We have a desktop and hierarchical files which have to mean everything.
author: Ted Nelson

quote: People talk about computer programmers as if computers are our whole lives. That's simply not true.
author: Ellen Ullman

quote: The wise man must remember that while he is a descendant of the past, he is a parent of the future.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Girls are the future mothers of our society, and it is important that we focus on their well-being.
author: Miriam Makeba

quote: We can build a much brighter future where humans are relieved of menial work using AI capabilities.
author: Andrew Ng

quote: Children have neither a past nor a future. Thus they enjoy the present, which seldom happens to us.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Bahrain 's margin of freedom is growing day after day as we head into the future with steady steps.
author: Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa

quote: I see a future where getting to work or to school or to the store does not have to cause pollution.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: I believe in the future of country music, but a future without roots is like a kite with no string.
author: Marty Stuart

quote: I will keep working hard in future as well so that audience will keep showering their love upon me.
author: Vicky Kaushal

quote: I was about to write that in the future I would chose my words more carefully but I'm sure I won't.
author: Don Cheadle

quote: I would like my architecture to inspire people to use their own resources, to move into the future.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: Technology has opened up the music business 100-fold and provided space for all kinds of new faces.
author: Andy Mineo

quote: In a world of global competition and new technology, I think competition is coming from new places.
author: Charles L. Evans

quote: The underlying principles of strategy are enduring, regardless of technology or the pace of change.
author: Michael Porter

quote: Life is only a long and bitter suicide, and faith alone can transform this suicide into a sacrifice.
author: Franz Liszt

quote: The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in God.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: In any great organization it is far, far safer to be wrong with the majority than to be right alone.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: I never did anything alone. Whatever was accomplished in this country was accomplished collectively.
author: Golda Meir

quote: I am not the only person who uses his computer mainly for the purpose of diddling with his computer.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Even when I work with computers, with high technology, I always try to put in the touch of the hand.
author: Issey Miyake

quote: Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible.
author: Ida Tarbell

quote: After centuries of dormancy, young women... can now look toward a future moulded by their own hands.
author: Rita Levi-Montalcini

quote: As the world has changed through globalisation and technology, it has left many feeling left behind.
author: Chuka Umunna

quote: Absolutely everything undergoes evolvement - whether it's technology, journalism, the NFL, medicine.
author: Marv Levy

quote: People come to museums for storytelling and engagement, and the technology needs to facilitate that.
author: Jake Barton

quote: What I found personally to be true was that it's easier to manipulate people rather than technology.
author: Kevin Mitnick
